name: Idempotent removal - repeating the operation
description:
To protect data consistency and the user experience,
  the system should clearly communicate errors and block invalid operations.
descriptionHtml:
To protect data consistency and the user experience,
the system should clearly communicate errors and block invalid operations.
statusMessage:
[HTTP status] 
Expecting actual:
  200
to be in:
  [404, 400, 204]
statusTrace:
java.lang.AssertionError: [HTTP status] 
Expecting actual:
  200
to be in:
  [404, 400, 204]

	at eu.delimata.bookstore.stepdefinitions.BooksSteps.systemInformsItemUnavailableOnSecondDelete(BooksSteps.java:237)
	at ✽.the system informs me the book item is already unavailable and no further changes are made(classpath:eu/delimata/bookstore/books-negative.feature:42)

steps.name: Given I have valid permissions to manage the bookstore
Given a book exists in the bookstore

parameters.name: book
parameters.value: Book[id=1786215807, title=Great Work of Time, description=Rem nobis quos ullam eum omnis., pageCount=97, excerpt=Iste quos quaerat quasi ratione. Quis deleniti expedita iure expedita. Et delectus rem voluptatem autem in ullam. Placeat ducimus asperiores quos ullam., publishDate=2025-09-21T04:10:40.031863139Z]

steps.name: And I have removed that book from the bookstore
When I attempt to remove the same book again
Then the system informs me the book item is already unavailable and no further changes are made

to be in:
